plot: When a lawyer finds out that one of his clients, a pretty widow, is about to inherit a considerable amount of money, he suddenly sees her as marriage material, despite the fact that he's already engaged to his stenographer.
title: The Little Widow
plot_es: When a lawyer finds out that one of his clients, a pretty widow, is about to inherit a considerable amount of money, he suddenly sees her as marriage material, despite the fact that he's already engaged to his stenographer.
plot_en: When a lawyer finds out that one of his clients, a pretty widow, is about to inherit a considerable amount of money, he suddenly sees her as marriage material, despite the fact that he's already engaged to his stenographer.

cast.role: Haddy - Finn's Partner and Rival Suitor
cast.name: Billy Armstrong
